chinese: 你下一次出差是什么时候?
english: When are you going on your next trip?

chinese: 快了. 是去捷克共和国(Czech Republic).
english: Pretty soon. It'll be to the Czech Republic.

chinese: Oh, 我太想去中欧(Central Europe)了.
english: Oh, I'm dying to go to Central Europe.

chinese: 我盼着这次旅行快点儿到来,
english: I'm looking forward to it,

chinese: 但会有许多工作要做.
english: but it will be so much work.

chinese: 为什么?
english: Why?

chinese: Jim Bigelow想要公司在Prague的饭店制定出一个和我们一样的市场营销计划.
english: Jim Bigelow wants the company's hotel in Prague to develope marketing plan just like ours.

chinese: Wow, 太棒了!
english: Wow, great!

chinese: 要在三个月内完成.
english: In three months.

chinese: 那有好多工作要做.
english: That is a lot of work.

chinese: Anne, 要是我能帮上什么忙,
english: Anne, if I can do anything to help,

chinese: 请让我知道.
english: please let me know.

chinese: 我会的.
english: I will.

chinese: 下一次带我一起去,
english: And next time, take me with you.

chinese: 我想到Old Town Square的咖啡馆里坐坐.
english: I want to sit in a cafe in the Old Town Square.

chinese: 那也是我最喜欢做的事.
english: That is my favorite thing to do.

chinese: 我听说那儿的爵士乐很棒.
english: And I hear there's great jazz.

chinese: Oh yes.
english: Oh yes.

chinese: 也是购物的好地方.水晶…
english: And serious shopping. Crystal...

chinese: 我会帮你买一些, 如果你喜欢.
english: I'll pick some up for you, if you like.

chinese: 古董玻璃器(Antique glass...)...刺绣(Embroidery)...
english: Antique glass... Embroidery...

chinese: 我还看过很漂亮的瓷器, 来自那边.
english: I've seen lovely china from there.

chinese: Nina, 要不你和我一起去吧,那样事情就简单多了.
english: Nina, it'll be much easier if you just come along.
